text: Carrie Lam Cheng Yuet-ngor, GBM, GBS (; n√©e Cheng, born 13 May 1957) is a Hong Kong politician. She was the 4th Chief Executive of Hong Kong from 2017 to 2022. She was the Chief Secretary for Administration, from 2012 to 2017, and as Secretary for Development from 2007 to 2012. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Chief Executives of Hong Kong Category:Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons List
title: Carrie Lam
